scripts.package:refresh: rm -rf node_modules; rm -f package-lock.json; npm i --workspaces false
scripts.build-windows: (cross-env MIGRATIONS_DIR=.migrate npm run build-core) && npm run build-pack
scripts.build-unix: (cross-env MIGRATIONS_DIR=/tmp/.migrate npm run build-core) && npm run build-pack
scripts.build-mac: APPLEIDPASS=$(security find-generic-password -w -a ivansglazunov@gmail.com) APPLEID=ivansglazunov@gmail.com CSC_NAME='Deep Foundation (XXXXXXXXXX)' npm run build-unix
scripts.build-chrome-extension:linux: npm run export && mv ./app/_next ./app/next && cd ./app && grep -rl '/_next' * | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g' && cd ../ && rsync -va --delete-after app/next/ extension/next/ && cp app/*.html extension && rimraf app
scripts.build-chrome-extension:darwin: npm run export && cp -r app/* extension && mv -i extension/_next extension/next && find ./extension -type f \( -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" -o -name "*.json" \) -exec sed -i '' 's/_next/next/g' {} + && rimraf extension.pem && /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --pack-extension=./extension
scripts.build-android: rimraf app && npm run export && npx cap sync android
scripts.build-electron: npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron
scripts.dev-electron: npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron
scripts.add-android: npm run export && rimraf ./android && npx cap add android
scripts.install-next-electron: npm ci && cd electron && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.build-ios: rimraf app && npm run export && npx cap sync ios
